item.description:
Welcome to EVOO!

EVOO, an acronym for extra virgin olive oil, serves eclectic, New American cuisine. EVOO was named best Eclectic restaurant in Boston in the 2007/2008 Zagat Guide!

They use as many local ingredients as possible, and change their menu daily. Produce from Verrill Farms, Eva's Garden, Angelini Farm and various local farmers' markets, livestock from Lovejoy Brook Farm and clams from Pat Woodbury are frequently on their menu.

EVOO strive to offer great food in a relaxed and comfortable atmosphere. They are thrilled to have just celebrated our 10-year anniversary of opening EVOO and look forward to many years to come!

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Dinner at eVoo - Somerville
